resources.string: Completed on-campus studies and currently taking distance education courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science (Available for full-time W2 employment).

Language: Java, JavaScript, PL/SQL 
Frameworks/web: Spring(Boot, MVC, Security), Hibernate, JDBC 
Microservices/Cloud: AWS, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka 
Databases: Oracle, PL/SQL, MySQL, MongoDB 
Tools: Intellij IDE, Maven, GitHub, GitLab, UML

Skilled Android developer and software engineer with around 5 years of experience playing key role in developing and optimizing business-critical enterprise mobile apps. Hands-on technical skill using Java, Kotlin, Dart, and Flutter, with expertise in database design and Android SDK development. Talent for project leadership and collaboration with diverse technical and cross-functional teams.
Name: Dinesh Kumar Sarma LinkedIn Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dinesh-sarma/
